name: hyperapp
description: The tiny framework for building web interfaces.
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.test: nyc -i esm -r lcov testmatrix test/*.test.js && nyc report
scripts.build: export pkg=$npm_package_name; npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: env msg=$npm_package_version npm run create && npm publish
